I'll give you a bullet from one of the slides from my presentation and create a speaker note from it in [TARGETLANGUAGE]. The length of this slide should be 2 minutes. Read following contents [PROMPT]
PromptHint: Copy and paste your slide bullets. I'll convert them into speaker notes.
